Catalog_Raisonne:
Masterpieces from the Japanese painting collection of the Minneapolis Institute of Art
ミネアポリス美術館 日本絵画の名品 Cat.52
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Carl W. Jones in Memory of Her Husband
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
signed: 東洲斎写楽画 {Tōshūsai Sharaku ga}
text:
Related to the play Keisei sanbon karakasa けいせい三本傘, performed at the Miyako Theater in the 7th lunar month of 1794.
Seven impressions known.
title: Actor Ichikawa Yaozō III as Fuwa Banzaemon Shigekatsu
